events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred at an intersection, initiating the claim process for damage assessment.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under the Auto Accident cluster as it involves a car collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the vehicle accident claim to ensure a smooth resolution.
Acknowledgment was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps.
Request for police report, vehicle registration, and photos of the accident scene was sent to the claimant.
Customer submitted all requested documentation including the police report and detailed accident photographs.
Investigation into the collision circumstances and extent of vehicle damage began following document verification.
Investigation concluded with findings supporting the claim as valid with moderate damage to the vehicle.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the claimant based on repair cost estimates and damage assessment.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the clarity of communication throughout.
Claim approval was finalized after the customer accepted the settlement terms and all policies were verified.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s designated account promptly.
The auto accident claim was officially closed following issuance of payment and confirmation of claim resolution.
